content.question: What is the role of logistics in relation to programme activities?

answers.option: Define logistics needs to achieve programme goals
Decide what items will be distributed

content.correct: Correct! Logistics ensures requirements needed to meet programme goals.
content.incorrect: The correct answer is: Define logistics needs to achieve programme goals.
